info.en:
Location of Nodes
Beijing, China

Server Configuration:
We provide Master-Slave structure of node. There are two stages in total. We will step in the second stage once the workload reached the 70% of capacity.

First Stage
Master(model: AWS x1e.16xlarge)
Slave(model: AWS x1e.8xlarge)

Second Stage
Master(model: AWS x1e.32xlarge)
Slave(model: AWS x1e.16xlarge)

Test node
vCPU: 16
Memory: 128G
Bandwidth: 1Gb
Storage: 10Tb, AWS EFS
Location: Hong Kong

Group Introduction:
Eos.Store Team is consisted of a group of steadfast Eos believers, blockchain fanciers who are devoted to working with EOS holders for an efficient decentralized community featuring freedom, openness, equality and mutual trust. 

Find us:

Beijing, China

服务器配置
we provide Master-Slave structure of node. There are two stages in total. We will step in the second stage once the workload reached the 70% of capacity.

团队介绍
Eos.Store团队是由一群Eos坚定信仰者、区块链技术发烧友组成,立志与EOS持有者一起共建一个自有、开放、平等、互信的高效去中心化社区。同时作为超级节点的竞选者之一,期望可以成为其守护者以及EOS生态繁荣的建设者,并致力构造一个开放、多元、平衡的应用生态。
